description:
Create a new team bound to an organization.  Only the name of the
team is needed to create it, the slug can be auto generated.
example_request:
POST /api/0/organizations/the-interstellar-jurisdiction/teams/ HTTP/1.1
Host: sentry.io
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "name": "Ancient Gabelers"
}
example_response:
HTTP/1.1 201 CREATED
Content-Length: 248
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Content-Language: en
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
Vary: Accept-Language, Cookie
Allow: GET, POST, HEAD, OPTIONS
X-Frame-Options: deny
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "avatar": {
    "avatarType": "letter_avatar", 
    "avatarUuid": null
  }, 
  "dateCreated": "2018-11-06T21:20:08.115Z", 
  "hasAccess": true, 
  "id": "3", 
  "isMember": true, 
  "isPending": false, 
  "memberCount": 1, 
  "name": "Ancient Gabelers", 
  "slug": "ancient-gabelers"
}

parameters.description: the optional name of the team.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: the optional slug for this team.  If not provided it will be auto generated from the name.
parameters.name: slug

path_parameters.description: the slug of the organization the team should be created for.
path_parameters.name: organization_slug

title: Create a new Team
